newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Chariot H1 shr leaps, cautions holders.
newsitem.headline: Chariot H1 shr leaps, cautions holders.

text.p: Half year ended February 28, 1997 vs proforma six months ended February 29, 1996

NOTE - Chariot said it was in talks related to the acquisition of a company and if succesful they could have an impact on its share price. It urged shareholders to exercise caution in their share dealings.
It is company policy to declare dividends at the end of a financial year.
